name: JSON
description:
/**
 * Represents the MIME type for JSON content.
 *
 * This content type is used to indicate that the body of the request or response is in JSON format.
 * JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) is a lightweight data-interchange format that is easy for humans to read
 * and write, and easy for machines to parse and generate. It is commonly used for API requests and responses,
 * allowing structured data to be exchanged between clients and servers.
 */
